meanings.definition: A small, insectivorous mammal native to Africa.
meanings.sent1: The aardwolf hunts termites at night.
meanings.sent2: I saw an aardwolf at the zoo last week.
meanings.sent3: The aardwolf tried to eat a termite but got scared!
meanings.sent4: She moved as quietly as an aardwolf stalking its prey.
meanings.sent5: The aardwolf's long ears help it listen for insects underground.
